```javascript
{
	a11y: true
	react: false
	js: Map ["noArguments" => true]
	ts: Map ["noExplicitAny" => true]
}
```

```javascript
{
	a11y: true

	js: Map ["noArguments" => true]

}
```

```javascript

}
```
